level.heading: Action on plan of domestication by domesticating limited liability company.

level.text: A plan of domestication shall be consented to:
By all the members if the domesticating company is a limited liability company; and
As provided in the domesticating company's governing statute, if the company is a foreign limited liability company.

Subject to any contractual rights, after a domestication is approved, and at any time before articles of domestication are delivered to the Mayor for filing under ยง 29-809.08, a domesticating limited liability company may amend the plan or abandon the domestication:
As provided in the plan; or
Except as otherwise prohibited in the plan, by the same consent as was required to approve the plan.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 1011 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
